      • validateDimensions

        public static void validateDimensions(String widthStr,
                      String heightStr)
                               throws SettingsException
        Validates that the given width and height.
        Parameters:
        widthStr - width to validate.
        heightStr - height to validate
        Throws:
        SettingsException - thrown if the given width and/or height is invalid.

      • validateBindings

        public static void validateBindings(PairedList<String,KeyBinder<Integer>> binderList)
                             throws SettingsException
        Validates that the given bindings are valid.
        Parameters:
        binderList - a paired list containing a description of the bound command as the first element, and an integer KeyBinder as the first.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - thrown if the bindings are invalid.

      • setSettings

        public static void setSettings(int width,
               int height,
               Difficulty difficulty,
               List<KeyBinder<Integer>> binders)
        Sends the given width, height and difficulty to the SettingsManager, and configures the command handler according to the given key binders.

        The command handler will be modified so that the key, returned by each key binder's getKey() method, will be bound to the command identifier, returned by each binder's getBinding() method.

        Parameters:
        width - width to set.
        height - height to set.
        difficulty - difficulty to set.
        binders - a list of key binders.
        See Also:
        SettingsManager
